messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] new to homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: The message archives are full of wonderful info and conversations that can enlighten others (or certainly me!) for years to come.  Also, try these links...
messages.messageBody:
The message archives are full of wonderful info and conversations that can
enlighten others (or certainly me!) for years to come. Also, try these
links... almost neverending sources of unschooling info and enjoy:

http://sandradodd.com/unschooling
http://joyfullyrejoycing.com

~Katherine
